Plot: A rock journalist is assigned to track down her ex-boyfriend.
Title: Lucky Them
Writer: Huck Botko (screenplay), Caroline Sherman (original idea), Emily Wachtel (screenplay)
Actors: Toni Collette, Thomas Haden Church, Oliver Platt, Ryan Eggold
tomatoConsensus: Lucky Them may not quite live up to Toni Collette's bravura starring performance, but it's certainly elevated by it.
